: Ensure that the underlying tables/views are properly indexed on columns frequently used in joins or filters to optimize query performance.
: If performance becomes a bottleneck, consider materializing the view or using indexed views to improve query response times.
: Ensure that access to this view is restricted to authorized users only, as it contains sensitive financial and account information.
: Implement row-level security if different users should have access to different subsets of the data based on roles or permissions.
: Regularly audit access logs and monitor usage patterns to detect unauthorized access or anomalies.
: Ensure that the underlying views are consistently updated and maintained to prevent discrepancies in the consolidated data.

: Maintain thorough documentation of the view's purpose, structure, and dependencies to facilitate maintenance and onboarding of new team members.
